query:
INSERT INTO requirements (frameworkId, articleNumber, title, description, category, riskLevelApplicable, isMandatory) VALUES 
-- NIST AI RMF GOVERN Function
(2, 'GOVERN 1', 'AI Governance Policies', 'Establish policies, processes, procedures, and practices for AI risk management.', 'Govern', 'all', 0),
(2, 'GOVERN 2', 'Accountability Structures', 'Define roles, responsibilities, and lines of communication for AI risk management.', 'Govern', 'all', 0),
(2, 'GOVERN 3', 'Workforce Diversity', 'Cultivate a culture of AI risk awareness with diverse, equitable, and inclusive workforce.', 'Govern', 'all', 0),
(2, 'GOVERN 4', 'Organizational Context', 'Consider organizational mission, stakeholder expectations, and risk tolerance.', 'Govern', 'all', 0),
-- NIST AI RMF MAP Function
(2, 'MAP 1', 'Context Establishment', 'Establish context for AI system including intended purpose, users, and deployment environment.', 'Map', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MAP 2', 'Risk Categorization', 'Categorize AI system based on potential impacts and risk levels.', 'Map', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MAP 3', 'AI Benefits and Risks', 'Identify potential benefits and risks of the AI system to individuals and society.', 'Map', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MAP 4', 'Risk Prioritization', 'Prioritize risks based on likelihood and potential impact.', 'Map', 'all', 0),
-- NIST AI RMF MEASURE Function
(2, 'MEASURE 1', 'Risk Metrics', 'Establish metrics to assess AI system risks including accuracy, fairness, and security.', 'Measure', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MEASURE 2', 'Testing and Evaluation', 'Conduct testing and evaluation to measure AI system performance and risks.', 'Measure', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MEASURE 3', 'Continuous Monitoring', 'Implement continuous monitoring of AI system performance and emerging risks.', 'Measure', 'all', 0),
-- NIST AI RMF MANAGE Function
(2, 'MANAGE 1', 'Risk Response', 'Develop and implement risk response strategies (accept, mitigate, transfer, avoid).', 'Manage', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MANAGE 2', 'Risk Treatment', 'Implement controls and safeguards to address identified risks.', 'Manage', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MANAGE 3', 'Incident Response', 'Establish incident response procedures for AI system failures or adverse events.', 'Manage', 'all', 0),
(2, 'MANAGE 4', 'Documentation', 'Document risk management activities, decisions, and outcomes.', 'Manage', 'all', 0);
